word_mean: 〔复stigmas或stigmata〕特征：有助于确定或诊断某一疾病的任何精神或躯体标志或特征
出血病灶：手和／或足紫癜性或出血性病灶，类似酷刑创伤
柱头：植物雌蕊的最上部，分泌湿润、粘胶性物质，以粘住到达此处的花粉
眼点：位于载色原虫前部的微红色或棕红色(偶为无色)小点或短杆，其确切性质不明

sentence.Network_en: There is very little stigma attached to crime and criminals.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们几乎都不把犯罪和罪犯视为一种耻辱。

sentence.Network_en: Being an unmarried mother used to carry a social stigma.
sentence.Network_cn: 做未婚母亲在社会上曾是不光彩的事.

list.abs: ...斑点雀鲷（学名：Pomacentrus stigma）为雀鲷科雀鲷属的鱼类，俗名泰布拉雀鲷。分布于菲律宾以及台湾南端等，主要栖息于外海珊瑚礁上缘处。该物种的模式产地在菲律宾。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies.

styles geniculate at base , gradually thickened upward , often sparsely papillose , apically curved downward forming a hooked beak a smaller stigma hole at tip of beak .花柱膝曲的在基部，向上逐渐加厚，通常稀疏具乳头，先端向下弯曲形成一钩状的喙，在喙先端具小的柱头孔。
尤其是那些具有“社会污名” (social stigma)的人群, 更容易表现出诸如沮丧、焦虑等负面情感 (Major & O’Brien, 2005)。 2.2 信息决策.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a mark made by pricking or branding): via Latin from Greek stigma 'a mark made by a pointed instrument, a dot'; related to stick

entry.def: If something has a stigma attached to it, people think it is something to be ashamed of.

example.ex: There is a strong argument for remaining an unmarried mother. There's no stigma attached any more...
example.tran: 有强有力的理由来支持未婚妈妈。这再也不是什么丢脸的事了。

example.ex: There is very little stigma attached to crime and criminals.
example.tran: 人们几乎都不把犯罪和罪犯视为一种耻辱。

entry.def: The stigma of a flower is the top of the centre part which takes in pollen.

means.word_mean: 1. the apical end of the style where deposited pollen enters the pistil
2. a symbol of disgrace or infamy;

sentences.sentence: "And the Lord set a mark upon Cain"--Genesis

means.word_mean: 3. an external tracheal aperture in a terrestrial arthropod
4. a skin lesion that is a diagnostic sign of some disease
